CALICE::MipTrackFinder

CALICE::MipTrackFinder Class Reference

Processor to extract MIP calibrations from muon beam runs. More...

Detailed Description

Processor to extract MIP calibrations from muon beam runs.

Author:
N.D'Ascenzo, DESY, S. Richter, DESY
Date:
Jul 13 2006, 2008

Field Documentation

int CALICE::MipTrackFinder::_trackNoHitsThreshold [private]

choose amplitude to be used to perform the mip cut

minimum number of hits for which a track is considered to be a muon track (used only with TrackSelectionMode=NHITS)
